items.sentence: Tom couldn\'t have opened the door without your help.
I still need to know why you weren\'t here yesterday.
I suspect that Tom didn\'t want to do that with Mary.
Mary doesn\'t like it when Tom takes her for granted.
If you do that, you\'ll be making a fool of yourself.
Do you think you could teach me to play the bagpipes?
I don\'t remember ever seeing Tom carrying a red bag.
I don\'t remember where I met Tom for the first time.
I don\'t see any way of stopping Tom from doing that.
Tom falls in love with every beautiful girl he meets.
Tom fell asleep while driving and caused an accident.
Tom fell in love with Mary the first time he met her.
Tom fell in love with Mary the first time he saw her.
Tom is not as good a chess player as he thinks he is.
Tom is old enough to know that what he did was wrong.
Tom is one of the three men that came here yesterday.
Tom hasn\'t been to Boston as many times as Mary has.
Tom hasn\'t changed his mind and probably never will.
I don\'t suppose you know anything about Tom, do you?
I don\'t think I ever knew what Tom did for a living.
I don\'t think Tom and Mary have finished doing that.
Tom doesn\'t earn enough money to support his family.
There are still a lot of things that have to be done.
I haven\'t had a home-cooked meal since my wife died.
They killed Tom as an example to the other prisoners.
This bread is really delicious. Where did you buy it?
Tom abandoned his dream of becoming an oceanographer.
Let\'s continue working together to make that happen.
Tom told me he wouldn\'t be able to be here tomorrow.
How are we going to fit all of this stuff in the car?
How did you get Tom to help you clean out the garage?
Tom has been nice to me, but I still don\'t like him.
Tom burned all of the letters that Mary had sent him.
Tom came to save Mary like a knight in shining armor.
I have two cats. One is white and the other is black.
I think Tom came here to tell us something important.
Tom and Mary haven\'t finished eating yet, have they?
Tom and Mary haven\'t heard from John in a long time.
Tickets are available at the door for thirty dollars.
Tom Jackson founded this university thirty years ago.

I\'m hungry because I didn\'t have time to eat lunch.
I\'m pretty sure Tom and Mary don\'t know each other.
If you try your best now, happiness will come to you.
I\'m not ready to be in a serious relationship again.
I\'m sure Tom has some questions he wants to ask you.

Tom speaks French much better than he speaks English.
It would be a shame to let all this food go to waste.
What would you like to do while you\'re in Australia?
